article_title: Amazon is testing shopping, health assistants as it pushes deeper into generative AI
summary: Amazon is expanding its generative artificial intelligence offerings by testing a shopping assistant and health-focused chatbot. The shopping tool, called Interests AI, helps users find products using conversational language, while the health assistant, Health AI, provides medical guidance and product suggestions. Amazon is investing heavily in AI across its various businesses, with plans to make these features available to all U.S. users soon. The company has built over 1,000 generative AI applications and is exploring AI applications in healthcare.
